name: really-relaxed-json
keywords: json, rjson, rrjson, relaxedjson, relaxed, comma, colon, comment, really, no commas, no quotes, pretty, without, backtick
description: A really relaxed version of JSON parsing and formatting that allows for optional commas, quotes, and comments.
